description: What an amazing day, today my buddy came in to the bathroom and had no idea I was in there taking a bubble bath. He was stunned but I saw something else in his eyes. So once he finished doing what he had to do, I started talking to him and couldnt help but notice the bulge print on his pants.. I never thought Sage would like sucking another mans dick.. Wow.. Enjoy.
title: Solid As A Rock
